titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for carrying out the National Climate Program for fiscal years 1988 and 1989.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Referred to Subcommittee on Natural Resources, Agricultural Research, and Environment.

committee.subcommittee: Natural Resources, Agricultural Research and Environment
committee.name: House Science, Space and Technology

bill.summary: 3/19/1987--Introduced. Amends the National Climate Program Act to extend the authorization of appropriations through FY 1988 and 1989.
